name: Akimbo (MoonsPod)
description:
Description

A twin-stick score attack arena shooter where you can swap between shooting together (Cahoots) and apart (Akimbo)

You play as an 80s TV show cop who must survive the onslaught of robots sent to enslave Miami by the evil Doctor Von Voncavich. Victory is impossible, but there's no way you're going down without a fight. Survive as long as you can dual wielding guns like a total bad @$$, show Miami you're the best d@mn 80s TV show cop Miami's ever seen. (I'm totally making this s#!7 up right now... :I)

Instructions MovementAimingShootingShoot StyleSpecial /DodgeWASD or Arrow keysMouseLeft mouse buttonRight mouse buttonSpace barLeft thumbstick or DPADRight thumbstickRight triggerLeft bumperLeft trigger

Shooting style
Swap between Akimbo and Cahoots shooting styles

Special / Dodge
This is different depending on your shooting style and has a 10 second cooldown once used, while in use you are invulnerable and deal damage to any enemy you touch

Difficulty
The more waves you complete the greater the difficulty becomes (Dial top left of screen)

Health
When this reaches 0, its game over (Top right of screen)

Wave Countdown
This bar (Left of screen) slowly ticks down over time, when a wave is completed it will reset at a slightly decreased position than the prior wave. If all the enemies on screen are not defeated (including power ups) when it reaches the bottom a new wave will be spawned, the difficulty will be greatly increased, and the time before the next wave will be greatly decreased

Multiplier
Your multiplier (Right of the screen) goes up by 1 whenever you get a kill then begins dropping faster and faster until you get another kill, getting kills in quick succession will award more points (enemies have different values)

Power ups
Badges (Award points), Satelites (Freeze Wave cooldown and Multiplier) and Donuts (Life) will spawn randomly, they will not stick around forever so grab them while you can
